page.title: 17My schoolday at Rolvenden(1)
page.content: I get up at 7.30 a.m. My bedroom has 3 posters of "Wham!" on the walls. After washing I put on my school uniform. Most of the children at my school wear school uniform but you don't have to. { I like toast and jam for breakfast {with fruit juice or a cup of tea. } At 8.30 I get my bike and cycle up to school from the Layne. There are about 60 children at our school but only three of us ride our bikes. { When we arrive at school we put our {bags in, then play in the playground. {When I walk in the playground I wonder {if the boys are playing football and {they usually are.} At 9 o'clock one of the teachers blows a whistle and we go into school. Our work is usually different each day. This morning we did a maths test. We stop for dinnertime at 12 o'clock.
